noUnusedFunctionParameters.description:
Description

Disallow unused function parameters.
There is an exception to this rule:
parameters that starts with underscore, e.g.function foo(_a, _b) {}.
noUnusedFunctionParameters.option:
The rule has the following options
ignoreRestSiblingsSection titled “ignoreRestSiblings”
Sincev2.1.0
Whether to ignore unused variables from an object destructuring with a spread.
Example:aandbinfunction({ a, b, ...rest }) { return rest;}should be ignored by this rule when set to false.
Defaults totrue.
